name: Tomasz Lee

My background includes a solid understanding of distributed systems and microservices architecture while leveraging tools such as **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Redis** for effective messaging. Proficient in both frontend and backend development with technologies like **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, **.NET**, and **C#**, I have a proven track record of optimizing performance while streamlining development processes. Additionally, I excel in technical communication and analytical problem-solving, fostering collaboration across teams and leading projects to successful outcomes, all while demonstrating empathy and flexibility in customer support roles.
